1: From when the moon came out 'till the sun came up
2: I was supplyin' the days when where they flame up
3: Our mamas passing, by trying to explain us
4: Pissing in the bushes like they never house trained us
5: But, try to understand thats how we came up
6: You get to know us, you'll love us but you can't change us (naw)
7: Really we rather be rich and famous
8: But in the mean time were forced to slang dust
9: 'Dro or crack cocaine, Penicillin to Rogaine
10: Ecstacy, Viagra, whatever'll get the dough mayne
11: I'm tired of people misrepresenting my domain
12: Oh you think we out here killing for nothing, hustling
14: I don't know if you don't know, don't care or can't see
15: Every time something up in the hood, it ain't me
16: And I ain't always up to no good and on the creep
17: So you ain't always gotta pass through the hood without speaking (how you doin'?)
18: We ain't out here threatening your lives, raping your children
19: We just out here staying alive, making a million (you know)
20: Working hard, trying to survive chasing a mill-ion
22: just think of us as chameleons
25: And burglarizing your house, I mean you just hurting my feelings
26: We got lives, we wanna live nice too
27: We got moms, dads, wives, kids just like you
28: But our options are few, it's hell in high school
29: When your helping with the rent lights and the gas bill too
30: So before you go judging us loving us won't hurt
31: When you're under 25, staying alive's hard work
32: And for you to see what I'm saying, open eyes will help
33: If you could think about somebody besides yourself
34: Why you pointing fingers at me, analyze yourself
35: Quit all that chastising and try to provide some help
36: Instead of calling the law and busting my balls
37: With all due respect, we don't even be fucking with y'all (maan)
38: And we can't help it cause it is like this
39: We don't like it no more than you that we live like this
40: Always stuck in the grind, summertime to wintertime
41: Cutting school to sell fifty dimes by dinner time
42: See everything we know we learned from the streets
43: Since thirteen I've been hustling and earning my keep
title: Doin My Job
